known_issues: Deployment/redeploy messages in this chat are not showing the final production live URL line (e.g., "Your production canister is live at: https://<canister-id>.icp0.io"), making it hard to find the app's public link.

new_feature_requests.summary: Perform a production deployment (not a preview build) so the app is accessible publicly, and provide the final public frontend URL in the deployment output in the exact format: "Your production canister is live at: https://<canister-id>.icp0.io".
Fix the deployment feedback/output so that production deployments reliably include the final public .icp0.io live link line (the missing URL line noted as a known issue in this project).

projectName: Deploy the app to production and surface the live .icp0.io URL
